explains: n. 演说者；演讲者；雄辩家

sentences.en: He was a natural politician, a gifted orator who knew how to work a crowd.
sentences.cn: 他曾是位天生的政治家，是位有天赋且知道如何凝集民众的演说家。

sentences.en: He also shone as an orator in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 他在议会中也以演说家的身份大放异彩。

sentences.en: "When Mary found this garden it looked quite dead," the orator proceeded.
sentences.cn: “玛丽发现这个花园时，它看上去死气沉沉。”演说者接着说。
